text: Ra hamile ‘‘madayana’’ tira unako bha'i ‘‘su'aibala'i’’ pathayaum. Unale bhaneh ki ‘‘he mera jati bandhuharu! Allahakai puja gara, usa baheka timro aru kunai satya pujaniya chaina.’’ Timiche'u timro palanakartabata spasta nisani a'isakeko cha, tasartha timile napataula pura–pura garnegara ra manisaharula'i uniharuka cijako matra ghata'i nadine gara ra prthvima sudhara pachi kharabi utpanna nagara. Yadi timi imanavala bha'eka chau bhane bujhihala yo timro hakama ramro cha
